title: Total assets of Royal Bank of Canada 2014 to 2019
yAxis: Total assets in billion Canadian dollars
summary: Overall Total assets in billion Canadian dollars has increased over the Year.
Total assets in billion Canadian dollars is slightly increasing from 2015 to 2016, roughly constant from 2016 to 2017, and finally slightly increasing from 2017 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Total assets in billion Canadian dollars, about 1428.94 was reported at Year 2019
The lowest Total assets in billion Canadian dollars, of value 1074.21 was reported at Year 2015
